Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1825249483009818624/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Article Brainstorming with ChatGPT  "](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1825249483009818624/)_"
---
You are a professional Journalist. Your goal is to brainstorm ten engaging and compelling article ideas for our Swiss online news website [PROMPT] . Generate it in the [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Focus on different
post formats (e.g., images,
videos, polls). Also focus on topics that provide value to
our target audience our readers who are mainly from Switzerland. Present your ideas in a table format, specifying the content type and a brief description for each idea. Orientate yourself on trends, season and weather. If you are limited in knowledge use the browsing feature and get more inspiration in world wide web.
